code: import isWindow from'./isWindow';export default function getscrollAccessor(offset){var prop=offset==='pageXOffset'?'scrollLeft':'scrollTop';function scrollAccessor(node,val){var win=isWindow(node);if(val===undefined){return win?win[offset]:node[prop];}if(win){win.scrollTo(win[offset],val);}else{node[prop]=val;}}return scrollAccessor;}
